com.conversantmedia.mapreduce.output

Class BloomFilterOutputFormat<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.OutputFormat<K,V>
      • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output.FileOutputFormat<K,V>
        • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output.TextOutputFormat<K,V>
          • com.conversantmedia.mapreduce.output.BloomFilterOutputFormat<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Key
    V - Value

    public class BloomFilterOutputFormat<K,V>
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output.TextOutputFormat<K,V>
    Output fomat for writing bloom filters. This is a simple wrapper around the Dotomi StringBloomFilter.
